item.title: 卡什卡利：美联储应在政策不确定的情况下长期按兵不动
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周三表示，他对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税对美国经济的影响感到不确定，关税可能会推高物价，因此需要提高利率，而关税可能会减缓经济增长，因此需要降低借贷成本。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve Bank President Neel Kashkari on Wednesday said he's uncertain about the effect of President Donald Trump's tariffs on the U.S. economy, with the possibility that they could push up prices arguing for higher interest rates, and the chance that they could slow economic growth calling for reducing borrowing costs.】

item.title: Stellantis的玛莎拉蒂在重新发布计划之前增加了定制选项
item.description: 意大利跑车制造商玛莎拉蒂是 Stellantis 集团旗下业绩最差的品牌之一，该公司周三表示，正在加强利润丰厚的定制服务，同时制定更广泛的扭亏为盈计划。【原文：Italian sports car maker Maserati, one of the worst performing brands within the Stellantis group, said on Wednesday it was boosting lucrative customisation services while working on wider turnaround plans.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储称第一季度美国石油和天然气活动有所增长
item.description: 达拉斯联储周三的一项调查显示，2025 年第一季度美国石油和天然气行业的活动略有增加，但企业的不确定性和悲观情绪也有所上升。【原文：Activity in the U.S. oil and gas sector increased slightly in the first quarter of 2025, but uncertainty and pessimism among companies also rose, a Dallas Fed survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 富达投资公司测试与美元挂钩的稳定币
item.description: 美国资产管理公司富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）正在探讨是否推出自己的稳定币，这是主流投资者希望从加密货币兴趣复苏中套现的最新迹象。【原文：U.S. asset manager Fidelity Investments is exploring whether to launch its own stablecoin, in the latest sign of mainstream investors looking to cash in on a revival of interest in cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 3 月中旬纳斯达克指数短线兴趣上涨 2.2
item.description: 纳斯达克交易所在周二晚些时候发布的一份声明中说，3 月中旬纳斯达克指数的空头利率上升了约 2.2%。【原文：Short interest on the Nasdaq rose about 2.2% in mid-March, the exchange said in a statement released late on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国财政部取消反洗钱法中对美国公司的报告要求
item.description: 美国财政部周三公布了一项临时最终规则，取消了美国公司、公民和其他实体根据反洗钱法报告受益所有权信息的要求，将范围缩小到外国实体。【原文：The U.S. Treasury on Wednesday published an interim final rule that removes a requirement for U.S. companies, citizens and other entities to report beneficial ownership information under an anti-money laundering law, narrowing the scope to foreign entities.】

item.title: EIA 称美国原油、汽油和馏分油库存下降
item.description: 美国能源信息署周三称，上周美国原油库存、汽油库存和馏分油库存均有所下降。【原文：U.S. crude stocks, gasoline and distillate inventories fell last week, the Energy Information Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 调查显示，随着特朗普关税计划的展开，首席财务官的乐观情绪有所下降
item.description: 据两家美联储银行和杜克大学的调查显示，由于关税风险和不确定性开始给企业高管的前景蒙上阴影，公司首席财务官的乐观情绪在第一季度有所下降，而唐纳德-特朗普总统的大选胜利曾给他们的前景带来鼓舞。【原文：Optimism among company chief financial officers dropped in the first quarter as tariff risks and uncertainty began to cloud an outlook among business executives that had been buoyed by President Donald Trump's election victory, according to a survey by two Federal Reserve banks and Duke University.】

item.title: 美国贸易争端加剧，加拿大皇家银行投资者权衡增长计划
item.description: 本周四，加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）将举行七年来的首次投资者日活动，股东们将重点关注经济增长，因为与主要美国市场的贸易紧张局势正在恶化。【原文：When Royal Bank of Canada convenes its first investor day in seven years on Thursday, shareholders will focus on growth, as trade tensions worsen with its key U.S. market.】

item.title: CBO 估计，如果不就债务上限采取行动，美国最快将在 8 月面临违约风险
item.description: 据无党派的国会预算办公室周三预测，除非国会采取行动提高国家债务上限，否则美国政府最快将在8月份面临36.6万亿美元债务中部分债务违约的风险。【原文：The U.S. government will risk defaulting on some of its $36.6 trillion in debt as soon as August unless Congress acts to raise the nation's debt ceiling, the non-partisan Congressional Budget Office forecast on Wednesday.】

item.title: 埃克森公司投资 1 亿美元建厂生产芯片工业用清洁酒精
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil）周三表示，将斥资 1 亿美元升级其位于路易斯安那州巴吞鲁日（Baton Rouge）的化工厂，以生产一种高纯度的异丙醇，这种异丙醇被科技行业用于清洁和处理微芯片。【原文：Exxon Mobil said on Wednesday it will spend $100 million to upgrade its Baton Rouge, Louisiana, chemical plant to produce a highly pure form of isopropyl alcohol that is used in the tech industry to clean and process microchips.】

item.title: 埃克森公司投资 1 亿美元建厂生产芯片工业用清洁酒精
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil）周三表示，将斥资 1 亿美元升级其位于路易斯安那州巴吞鲁日（Baton Rouge）的化工厂，以生产一种高纯度的异丙醇，这种异丙醇被科技行业用于清洁和处理微芯片。【原文：Exxon Mobil said on Wednesday it will spend $100 million to upgrade its Baton Rouge, Louisiana, chemical plant to produce a highly pure form of isopropyl alcohol that is used in the tech industry to clean and process microchips.】

item.title: 纽约联储详述问题学生贷款借贷可能迫在眉睫的上升趋势
item.description: 纽约联邦储备委员会的研究人员周三表示，各种大流行病时期的学生贷款支持计划的结束很可能预示着借款人的信贷问题会增加，尽管要了解问题的全部程度还需要时间。【原文：The end of various pandemic-era student loan support programs likely portends a rise in credit issues for borrowers, although it will take time to understand the full extent of the problem, New York Federal Reserve researchers said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Ninestar 向施乐出售利盟的价格远低于之前宣布的价格
item.description: 总部位于中国的九星公司计划将打印机和打印软件制造商利盟国际二期出售给施乐公司，交易价格估计高达 1.5 亿美元，仅为施乐公司 12 月份披露价格的一小部分。【原文：China-based Ninestar Corp plans to sell printer and printing software maker Lexmark International II to Xerox in a deal estimated at up to $150 million, a fraction of the price Xerox disclosed in December.】

item.title: 贝莱德推出新的示范投资组合，进一步推动私人市场发展
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）周三表示，该公司已推出首个混合私人资产和公开交易资产的示范投资组合，以扩大其在利润丰厚的私人市场领域的业务范围。【原文：BlackRock has launched its first model portfolio blending private and publicly traded assets, it said on Wednesday, as it looks to expand its footprint in the lucrative private market landscape.】

item.title: 美国银行上调 2025 年和 2026 年金价预期
item.description: 美国银行（BofA）上调了今明两年的黄金期价平均预期，同时强调美国贸易政策带来的不确定性将在短期内继续为金价提供支撑。【原文：Bank of America (BofA) has raised its gold period average forecasts for this year and next, while highlighting that uncertainty arising from U.S. trade policies will continue to lend support to prices in the near-term.】

item.title: 马里预计 2025 年黄金产量将因巴里克公司重新开业而增加
item.description: 路透社周三看到的一份文件显示，假定矿业巨头巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold）在与政府长达数月的对峙之后恢复运营，马里预测 2025 年工业黄金产量将略有回升。【原文：Mali is forecasting a slight recovery in industrial gold output in 2025 on the assumption that mining giant Barrick Gold will resume operations after a months-long standoff with the government, a document seen by Reuters on Wednesday showed.】

item.title: 英国皇家财务报告署（OBR）称，美国对等关税可能使英国经济增长下降 1
item.description: 据英国政府的独立财政监督机构称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁将于下周对世界各国征收新的互惠关税税率，这可能会使英国的经济增长最多下降 1%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's threats to impose new reciprocal tariff rates next week on countries around the world could cut British economic growth by up to 1%, according to the government's independent fiscal watchdog.】

item.title: Rivian 分拆公司还透露将生产轻型电动汽车
item.description: 微移动初创公司 Also 周三表示，该公司已从电动汽车制造商 Rivian Automotive 分离出来，并从风险投资公司 Eclipse 获得了 1.05 亿美元的 B 轮融资，将专注于轻型电动汽车。【原文：Micromobility startup Also said on Wednesday it has been spun-off from electric-vehicle maker Rivian Automotive with $105 million in Series B funding from venture capital firm Eclipse and will focus on lightweight EVs.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份核心资本货物订单意外下降
item.description: 2 月份美国主要制造业资本货物的新订单出人意料地减少，而且可能继续低迷，因为关税导致经济不确定性上升，阻碍了企业增加设备支出。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods unexpectedly fell in February and could remain sluggish as economic uncertainty rises because of tariffs, discouraging businesses from boosting spending on equipment.】

item.title: 总统办公室称中国汽车制造商奇瑞将在土耳其投资 10 亿美元
item.description: 土耳其总统府周三表示，中国汽车制造商奇瑞将在土耳其投资 10 亿美元，在萨姆松省北部建造一座年产 20 万辆汽车的生产厂。【原文：Chinese carmaker Chery will invest $1 billion in Turkey on a manufacturing facility in northern Samsun province with an annual 200,000 vehicle capacity, the Turkish presidency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 激进派 Starboard 提名三名董事进入欧特克董事会
item.description: 激进投资者 Starboard Value 周三表示，将向设计与工程软件制造商欧特克董事会提名三名董事，重燃其与该公司因利润问题而引发的代理权争夺战。【原文：Starboard Value is nominating three directors to design and engineering software maker Autodesk's board, the activist investor said on Wednesday, rekindling its proxy battle with the company over margin concerns.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度信实公司将因美国关税问题停止购买委内瑞拉石油
item.description: 三位消息人士周三称，在美国宣布对从南美国家购买原油的国家征收 25% 的关税后，拥有世界最大炼油厂的印度信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）将停止进口委内瑞拉石油。【原文：India's Reliance Industries , operator of the world's biggest refining complex, will halt Venezuelan oil imports after the United States announced a 25% tariff on nations buying crude from the South American nation, three sources said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印度 Wipro 赢得英国保险公司凤凰集团 6.5 亿美元大单
item.description: 印度第四大 IT 服务提供商 Wipro 公司周三表示，该公司赢得了英国保险公司凤凰集团价值 5 亿英镑（6.454 亿美元）的 10 年期合同，这是该公司本财年宣布的第二笔大型合同。【原文：Wipro , India's No.4 IT services provider, won a 10-year deal worth 500 million pounds ($645.4 million) from British insurer Phoenix Group , the company said on Wednesday, announcing its second mega deal this financial year.】

item.title: 美国公司持有的加密货币
item.description: 美国电子游戏零售商 GameStop 周二表示，它将把比特币列为国库储备资产，以实现公司持股的多元化，并押注世界上最大的加密货币将有助于扭转其陷入困境的主营业务。【原文：U.S. videogame retailer GameStop said on Tuesday it would include bitcoin as a treasury reserve asset to diversify its corporate holdings, betting on the world's biggest cryptocurrency to help turnaround its struggling primary business.】

item.title: GameStop 转向加密货币，一度受到零售投资者青睐的公司股价大涨
item.description: 随着视频游戏零售商进军加密货币领域，曾一度成为 "meme 股 "交易狂潮中心的 GameStop 周三股价再次吸引了投资者的注意。【原文：GameStop jumped on Wednesday as the shares that were once at the center of "meme stock" trading frenzy caught investor attention again with the video game retailer making its move into cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国电动卡车制造商 Windrose 将筹资目标提高到 3 亿美元
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，中国电动卡车初创公司Windrose正将其最后一轮融资额提高到3亿美元，该公司计划在欧洲和美国建立更多的组装厂。【原文：Chinese electric truck startup Windrose is increasing its final round of funding to $300 million, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said, as it plans more assembly plants in Europe and the United States.】

item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 企业浏览器岛在最新一轮融资中估值 48 亿美元
item.description: 企业浏览器初创公司 Island 周三表示，它在 Coatue Management 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 2.5 亿美元，估值达 48 亿美元。【原文：Enterprise browser startup Island said on Wednesday it was valued at $4.8 billion after raising $250 million in a funding round led by Coatue Management.】

item.title: 关税不确定性拖累华尔街期货下挫
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货下滑，投资者在等待经济数据和特朗普政府预计下周生效的新关税的更多信息时持谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. stock futures slipped on Wednesday, with investors exercising caution as they awaited economic data and more clarity on the Trump administration's fresh tariffs that are expected to take effect next week.】
